content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: @milkbun Oh yah! That brings meh to, how do ya make money over the summa if ur a 12 year old girl? I have a kitten too.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: @owlcity i like the storyline of UP...how old men can have great adventures too.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: Ahhh found cute boy  too bad hes older....
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 4:
Text: Anyone know of an archive containing old Omni Magazine articles? Google doesn't
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: At tam's wedding!! Gettin older and realizing "my time e coming soon!!!"
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: At the "souk" at Madinat Jumeriah Dubai. Shops, restaurants, man made canals, boats, fake old style Arabian buildings- feels like Vegas
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 7:
Text: Babysitting is FUN with a 2 yr old
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: Creepy old perverts suck
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 9:
Text: Damn yall... Ima be 26 nxt wk. I am old as hell!
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: Finished work, time for a coffee and to listen to some good old music
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: I'm about to sleep twitt, let's start dreaming about.... HIM . god I can't take this anymore, I want the old memories, please  come back.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: I've messed up my weekend rhythm. I think I've grown old. Well I guess this means I've actually have time to for study today.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: It's 1AM - and I cant sleep... Why - Cellcom is not going to market the new IPhone!!  Am I gonna get stuck with my old Iphone3G???
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 14:
Text: Its dark and we're going to see the asylum thats all old and crazy looking. Then we're going to the haunted tracks
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 15:
Text: Snoozed-in again thanks to being my own boss  I would get the boot at my old company
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: Some movies just never get old.  watching The Replacements. Hackman is awesome in this one.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: Those four year olds better be glad i'm tired, or i would tear them up in a hula hooping contest. Thats how we roll in my hood!! Haha.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: Will my 14 year old son please stop growing - He is now officially taller than me
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: ok, i'm so exhausted. contestants are still up.  i can't keep up with them. i'm an old man.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 20:
Text: playing at my old school playground still the same except them lame ass got rid of the tire swing
Annotation from annotator: 2

Target Example:
Text: @talkingbeans what your poor wife must listen to lol...hello mrs talkingbean& youngin bean!
Annotation from annotator:
